item.description:
Hey Folks!

If you're looking for a fun way to spend the afternoon on Sunday, September 13th, look no further! The Precinct Bar in Union Square is hosting the Precinct Outdoor Music Festival.

The music goes from 3:00PM to 9:00PM. The show will be set up in the parking lot behind the Independent and features a number of bands including: Jess Tardy Band; Jenny D & the Delinquents; Andrea Gillis Band; Barrence Whitfield & the Monkyhips.

Tickets are $15. A portion of the proceeds will go to help local charities.

Check out the Precinct web site for more info: http://www.precinctba...

It's possible that both Paul and I will get there a little late, but don't let that stop you!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the guy with the ponytail who looks like the guy in my picture :-)
item.name: Precinct Outdoor Music Festival
